changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Plugin permettant d'utiliser l'applicati: Plugin for using the Jeedom Mobile application
index.md.L'application mobile Jeedom nécessite l': The Jeedom mobile application requires the installation of this plugin so that the box can communicate with the Mobile application
index.md.Configuration du plugin Mobile pour Appl: Configuration of the Mobile plugin for Application V2
index.md.Après installation du plugin, il vous su: After installing the plugin, you just need to activate it
index.md.Première connexion à l'application V2: First connection to the V2 application
index.md.Sur le premier écran de l'application, i: On the first screen of the application, you are offered to connect your market account, and thus find all the boxes associated with this account, or simply add a box
index.md.Pour profiter des fonctionnalités de l'a: To benefit from the application's functionalities, the core of your Jeedom must be in 4.4
index.md.Il vous faut simplement rentrer votre id: All you have to do is enter your Market ID and password
index.md.Vous entrez l'url de votre Jeedom (inter: You enter the url of your Jeedom (internal or external), as well as the access identifiers to it and you confirm with the LOGIN button
index.md.un nouvel écran apparait; vous pourrez s: a new screen appears; you can scan a QR Code from the Mobile plugin of the Box you wish to add, via the QR Code tab of the plugin
index.md.Onglet QR Code du plugin Mobile: Qr Code tab of the Mobile plugin
index.md.Une fois cette première étape passée, vo: Once this first step has been completed, you are registered in the application
index.md.si vous possédez le plugin Mobile, vous: if you have the Mobile plugin, you will have access via the menu to Notifications, QR Codes, Menu customization
index.md.Dans le menu, vous aurez un onglet Boxs,: In the menu, you will have a Boxs tab, which groups together all the boxes present on this market account
index.md.Il vous suffit de cliquer sur la Box où: Simply click on the Box where the Mobile plugin is installed, then identify yourself to access the Box
index.md.La Box passera en haut de la liste, ayan: The box will go to the top of the list, having validated its authentication
index.md.Vous pouvez faire ainsi pour plusieurs B: You can do this for several boxes
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi cliquer sur le bouton: You can also click on the + button at the bottom right to access different options;
index.md.QR Code pour ajouter une Box à la liste: QR Code to add a Box to the list via the Mobile plugin
index.md.Manuel pour ajouter manuellement une Box: Manual to manually add a box
index.md.Détection Atlas et Luna (si vous êtes en: Detection Atlas and Luna (if you are on Wifi, will detect the boxes on the network
index.md.Synchronisation Market pour actualiser l: Market sync to update configured Market account information
index.md.Pour accéder aux fonctionnalités comme l: To access features such as Notifications, Menu Personalization or Geolocation, you must first have selected at least one current box
index.md.Nous ajoutons une zone de Géolocalisatio: We add a Geolocation zone by clicking on the + icon
index.md.Nous tapons l'adresse recherchée, nous v: We type the address we are looking for, we validate with Enter on his phone; the cursor will then position itself on the desired address
index.md.Nous pouvons ensuite ajouter un nom et s: We can then add a name and save the zone
index.md.Cela créera une nouvelle commande sur vo: This will create a new command on your mobile equipment, of binary type, which will correspond to the entries and exits of the zone if geolocation is activated on your mobile phone
index.md.Nous pouvons également changer le radius: We can also change the radius of the zone, to extend the detection of the zone
index.md.Cette partie est actuellement en cours d: This part is currently being improved and optimized on the beta application
index.md.J'ai des soucis d'affichage de ma webvie: I have problems displaying my webview
index.md.Sur votre Jeedom, dans les Préférences,: On your Jeedom, in the Preferences, check that the mobile home page is HOME
